author: Zoe Shenton
title: Who won Oscars at the 2017 Academy Awards? Full winners list
text:
Who won Oscars at the 2017 Academy Awards? Full winners list Find out who took home the top prizes at the annual ceremony Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now The Hollywood stars turn out for the 89th Oscars Share this video Get celebs   Thank you for subscribing!   
The who's who of the acting world descended on the Dolby Theatre in Hollywood on Sunday for the biggest night in the showbiz calendar. 
Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone's musical La La Land is expected to sweep the board at the 89th Academy Awards hosted by Jimmy Kimmel. 
The magical movie earned 14 nominations including Best Picture, Best Director, Best Original Song and Actor and Actress nods for Ryan and Emma. 
That means the film equalled the record held by Titanic and All About Eve as having the most Oscar nominations of all time. 
Meanwhile, Meryl Streep smashed her own record as having the most nominations, earning her 20th in the Best Actress category for Florence Foster Jenkins. 
While Justin Timberlake opened the ceremony with a show-stopping performance, John Legend, Sting and Lin-Manuel Miranda will also be performing their nominated songs on the night. Ryan Gosling (Photo: WireImage) Emma Stone (Photo: FilmMagic, Inc) Full winners list:
